import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navigation from '../component/header/Navigations' import {lnput} from 'react-router-dom' import { Container, Button, Form, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' const Login = () => { const [getUser, setUser] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }) const inputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setUser({ ...getUser, [name]: value }) } const inputUser = () => { console.log(getUser) } return ( <>

Login




 ) } export default Login
